item.description:
An informal drop in meeting, the 4th Tuesday of each month, at the Beth Israel Deaconess Hospital Coffee Shop, in Needham Center, followed by a gathering at "Not Your Average Joe's" in Needham,MA.
Contact jconnolly@artsfirst.org for more information.

Join US!!

group.name: The Boston Area Young Widow and Widowers Group

item.name: Young Widowed Group Meeting and Gathering
